title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using 9anon AI.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:
items: Account information: name, email, and encrypted password
Conversation history: questions and answers to improve your experience
Usage data: how you interact with our services
Technical information: browser type, device, and IP address

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Communicating with you about updates and services
Analyzing usage to develop our products
Ensuring the security of our platform

protection.title: 3. Data Protection
protection.content: We take your data security seriously:
items: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
Access to data is restricted and monitored

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share information only in the following cases:
items: With trusted service providers who help us operate our platform

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your data:

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our services. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via email or a notice on our platform.

contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
